name: SnaPaul
storyline:
Your name is Gibbon, and together with your cousin, you decide to prank your bald father. However, this will only be the beginning of the end.
The house is cursed, and nothing will ever be the same again!
summary:
The tragic horror story of a prank gone terribly wrong – a chilling horror experience.

SnaPaul is a first-person psychological horror game where you explore a dark, mysterious house. With 30/40 minutes of intense gameplay, every step brings you closer to a chilling finale. Face your fears and uncover hidden secrets in this unforgettable experience.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: SnaPaul Official Trailer new indie horror game 2025
